mapper.select: SELECT bpc.plant_id, p.plant_name, c.breeding_value, c.capacity, c.coop_name, c.coop_status, c.id, c.device_quantity, c.last_start_date, c.last_end_date FROM batch_plant_coop bpc LEFT JOIN plant p on bpc.plant_id = p.id LEFT JOIN coop c ON bpc.plant_id = c.plant_id WHERE bpc.plan_id = #{planId} AND coop_id IS NULL AND bpc.`enable` = 1 AND c.`enable` = 1 AND c.coop_status = 1
